air_system_component: Supply system base allowance for each fan system
Gas or oil furnace <90% Et or <90% AFUE
Gas or oil furnace >= 90% Et or >=90% AFUE

Evaporative humidifier/cooler in series with a cooling coil. Value shown is allowed W/cfm per 1.0 in. of water. Determine pressure loss (in. of water) at 400 fpm or maximum velocity allowed by the manufacturer, whichever is less.
